thread.title: Ministers signal they are against plastic bottle deposits
thread.title_full: Ministers signal they are against plastic bottle deposits

title: Ministers signal they are against plastic bottle deposits
text: show ad Plastic bottle betrayal: Ministers signal they are against deposits despite evidence plan would slash litter and boost recycling rates to 98% A Government insider said it was unlikely to get the go-ahead despite there being significant evidence that it could slash litter and boost recycling Studies in Europe show that such initiatives can push recycling rates up to 98% The current UK total is just 57 per cent and Keep Britain Tidy said it was astonishing that the Government was considering ruling out the idea
